pages.text: Iris Out expels the Maw's eye as a projectile known as the Iris Bullet. When fully charged—heralded by a distinct sound—the bullet will home in on targets if active.
However, the eye obeys your gaze rather than proximity. It seeks only what lies within your vision, ignoring enemies lurking behind you.

Instability (Enlightenment): To cast away one's own sight is a costly sacrifice. Firing an Iris Bullet exacts a heavy toll on durability, as the Maw consumes a massive amount of vitality to instantly regenerate the lost eye.
